description: Scenario where student hits npm not found, then completes after mentor help

responses.problem: Command not found: npm. The system does not recognize npm as a command.
responses.questionForMentor: I tried to run 'npm init -y' but got 'command not found: npm'. How do I install npm or Node.js?
responses.summary: Created directory but cannot initialize npm project

responses.problem: The instruction 'Update the configuration in your project to make it executable' is unclear. Which file should I update?
responses.questionForMentor: Which configuration file should I update? The tutorial mentions 'configuration file' but doesn't specify which one.
responses.summary: Created counter.js but stuck on configuration step

responses.questionForMentor: I get 'permission denied' when running ./counter.js. How do I make the script executable?
responses.summary: Cannot run the counter script due to permissions
Tutorial completed successfully after making script executable
